subject: Attention;Beneficiary.
body:
Attention;Beneficiary.

My Name Is Mrs.Cathleen H. Nash The bank's President And Chief Executive
Officer.

How are you today and your beloved family including work? I hope you are
all fine by the grace of almighty God. I am write to notify you that I will
be visiting some of the Bank in your state on Monday because I am scheduled
to have a brief meeting with some of these Bank in your City for businesses
and I will like to transfer your fund into your bank account sum of $32.5
Million United State Dollars as we have already being discussed.

Your payment files from Nat West Bank of London, And your fund was compiled
and submitted to my desk this morning for review. The total sum owed to you
by the  bank mentioned above was sum up to the tune of $32.5 Million United
State Dollars. If you can meet up with the required fees $100 Today or
Tomorrow I will transfer your fund into your bank account or we deliver the
ATM card to your home address.

You are required to send the fee of $100 to enable our ATM Center load your
funds into ATM CARD and I will ship the Card to your address which will
permit you to withdrawal of US$25,000 USD three times daily. You have relay
paid so much in this delivery that makes me wonder. You are a very lucky
person because i shall be transfer it by myself and there is nothing anyone
can do about it to stop me due to my position!

Note that if you still wish to receive your total sum owed to you by the
banks mentioned above tune of $32.5 Million United State Dollars better
move ahead and buy Steam Wallet Gift Card or i Tunes card $100 so that i
will be transfer your over due payment which has been delaying for a very
long time due to one reason or the other. As the Chairman Woodforest
National Bank. I have the veto power to go through customs and immigration
and As soon as am through with the meeting I will then proceed to your
address and hand over your ATM CARD to you if you prefer ATM CATD.

Send your bank details and cell phone number and address where you want me
to bring your package to which permit you to withdrawal of US$25,000 USD
three times daily.But if you need bank to bank wire transfer reconfirm your
bank information to me,

A, your delivery address....
B,your cell phone............
C,Banking details.........

I expect you to comply before it is two late so that the transfer can be
completed, If you do not comply, then it will not be my Fault. even if you
don't have the $100 try to borrow it and send it immediately because this
is your life opportunity,

Treat with urgency,And follow the instructions,

God bless you together with your family,


Yours sincerely,
Mrs.Cathleen H. Nash
Chief Executive Officer.
Woodforest National Bank

subject: Re: Attention;Beneficiary.
body:
Hello H. Nash,

I hope this message finds you well. It's quite a surprise to hear from the President and Chief Executive Officer of a bank! I'm doing fine, thank you for asking, and my family is also doing well.

It's interesting to hear that you'll be visiting banks in my state. May I ask what kind of businesses are being discussed? 

Regarding the fund transfer, it sounds like an enormous amount! However, I'm a bit confused about some details. Could you please clarify how much exactly is the sum owed to me? And why was it compiled and submitted to your desk?

Also, could you explain more about this ATM card? How does it work exactly? And why do I need to send a fee for it?

I appreciate your patience in answering these questions. Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
James
